attributes.title: All Oiled Up for Combat - Episode 25
attributes.caption: Strike Team Force continues their fight in the arena. Some downtime, questions, and new potions prep them for Round 2.
attributes.description: Strike Team Force continues their fight in the arena. Some downtime, questions, and new potions prep them for Round 2.
attributes.display_title: All Oiled Up for Combat - Episode 25

attributes.title: Bears, Books, & Battle Beasts - Episode 26
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force fights to survive and is reminded of the reason they came to the coliseum in the first place. Who is the assassin?
attributes.description: Squad Team Force fights to survive and is reminded of the reason they came to the coliseum in the first place. Who is the assassin?

attributes.title: Heavy Metal Werewolves - Episode 28
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force attempts to rescue Havleck from his suit of armor prison.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force attempts to rescue Havleck from his suit of armor prison.

attributes.title: Squad B-Team Force Assemble - Episode 29
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force makes some difficult decisions on who will help them assault Stein's Realm.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force makes some difficult decisions on who will help them assault Stein's Realm.

attributes.title: Raging in the Darkness, Kissing in the Moonlight - Episode 30
attributes.caption: Half of Squad Team Force broker a deal with Soll while the other half deal with a kidnapper at their front door.
attributes.description: Half of Squad Team Force broker a deal with Soll while the other half deal with a kidnapper at their front door.
attributes.display_title: Raging in the Darkness, Kissing in the Moonlight - Episode 30

attributes.title: Calamity in the Courtyard - Episode 31
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force fight off the invaders in the courtyard at the spire and then decide to take the fight to Stein...
attributes.description: Squad Team Force fight off the invaders in the courtyard at the spire and then decide to take the fight to Stein...

attributes.title: The Bloodlust Returns - Episode 32
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force has successfully learned the art of stealth and and made it into Stein's realm. But in order to make it to the inner workings of his sanctum they are going to have to get their hands dirty, and a few of them are itching to get started.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force has successfully learned the art of stealth and and made it into Stein's realm. But in order to make it to the inner workings of his sanctum they are going to have to get their hands dirty, and a few of them are itching to get started.

attributes.title: In the Arms of Betrayers - Episode 33
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force head into Stein's Estate. Kissing ghosts in the library,  the return of the dead, and a new Aeor Wight meet them.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force head into Stein's Estate. Kissing ghosts in the library,  the return of the dead, and a new Aeor Wight meet them.
attributes.display_title: In the Arms of Betrayers - Episode 33

attributes.title: Saving Realms & Starting Something Stinky - Episode 34
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force finally faces off with Stein to save Caladrius and determine the fate of Ravell. Who will survive and what's next on the horizon?
attributes.description: Squad Team Force finally faces off with Stein to save Caladrius and determine the fate of Ravell. Who will survive and what's next on the horizon?
attributes.display_title: Saving Realms & Starting Something Stinky - Episode 34
